onboarding.tagline: Ubufasha bwawe mu buhinzi bukoranye AI
onboarding.locationDescription: Emera aho uherereye kugira ngo ubone iteganyagihe ryizewe n'inama z'ubuhinzi zihuye n'akarere kawe.
onboarding.locationError: Ntabwo byashobotse kumenya aho uherereye. Gerageza bundi bushya.
onboarding.languageSubtitle: Hitamo ururimi ukunda gukoresha mu bufasha.

chat.fromVoice: Buvuye mu ijwi â€” hindura niba bibaye ngombwa
chat.voiceTranscribed: Ijwi ryahinduwe inyandiko! Hindura niba bibaye ngombwa, hanyuma ohereza.
chat.noInternet: Nta internet ihari. Nyabuneka reba umurongo wawe.
chat.imageAnalysisFailedBot: Isesengura ry'ifoto ryaranze. Nyabuneka ongera ugerageze.
chat.tapLocationToSet: Kanda aho uherereye kugira ngo uhashyireho

media.photoLibraryPermission: Kugira ngo uhitemo ifoto, ukeneye guha uburenganzira galerÃ­. Bikore muri Setingi.
media.cameraPermission: Kugira ngo ufate amashusho, ukeneye guha uburenganzira kamera. Bikore muri Setingi.

voice.recordingHint: Kanda Emeza kugira ngo wohore amajwi, cyangwa Hagarika kugira ngo ubireke

history.title: Ibiganiro
history.noConversationsHint: Tangira ikiganiro gishya ubone inama z'ubuhinzi
history.notConnectedHint: Amateka y'ibiganiro asaba umurongo wa internet

settings.title: Amasetingsi
settings.aiServicesSubtitle: Reba serivisi za AI zikoreshwa mu karere kawe
settings.locationUpdateFailed: Aho uherereye ntihashoboye kuvugururwa. Ongera ugerageze.
settings.resetOnboardingSubtitle: Tangira bundi bushya ukoresheje intambwe za mbere
settings.resetConfirmMessage: Bizongera gutangira inzira yo gutangira. Komeza?

mcp.title: Serivisi z'Ubwenge Bukorano
mcp.servicesAvailable: {active} muri {total} za serivisi zihari aho uherereye

agrivision.name: AgriVision
agrivision.description: Sesengura amafoto y'ibihingwa kugira ngo umenye indwara, udukoko n'ibura ry'intungamubiri. Hita ubona uburwayi, inama z'ubuvuzi n'uburyo bwo kwirinda.

isdaSoil.name: ISDA Ubutaka
isdaSoil.description: Bona amakuru yimbitse ku butaka harimo pH, azote, fosifore, potasiyumu n'izindi ntungamubiri. Bikora kuri Afurika yose ku rwego rwa metero 30.

accuweather.name: AccuWeather
accuweather.tagline: Ikirere cy'ubu n'iteganyagihe ku isi hose
accuweather.description: Bona amakuru y'iteganyagihe ako kanya harimo ubushyuhe, ubuhehere, umuvuduko w'umuyaga n'imvura. Iteganyagihe riboneka kugeza ku minsi 15.

gapWeather.name: GAP Iteganyagihe
gapWeather.description: Iteganyagihe ryihariye ry'ubuhinzi muri Kenya. Harimo isuhuka ry'amazi, urumuri rw'izuba n'iteganyagihe ry'imvura ryagenewe gufata ibyemezo mu buhinzi.

edacap.name: EDACaP Ikirere
edacap.tagline: Iteganyagihe ry'ikirere ry'ibihe by'ihinga muri Etiyopiya
edacap.description: Iteganyagihe ry'ikirere rishingiye ku bihe ririmo ubushyuhe n'imvura. Rifasha abahinzi gutegura igihe cyo gutera n'icyo gusarura.

weatherapi.name: WeatherAPI
weatherapi.description: Serivisi y'amakuru y'iteganyagihe itanga iby'ikirere by'ubu n'iteganyagihe ku isi hose.

tomorrowIo.name: Tomorrow.io
tomorrowIo.description: Urubuga rw'ubwenge bw'iteganyagihe rufite iteganyagihe ryimbitse n'ubushobozi bwo kumenya iby'ako kanya.

feedFormulation.name: Gutegura ibiryo by'amatungo
feedFormulation.tagline: Kubara imirire iboneye ku matungo y'inshyushyu
feedFormulation.description: Bara uruvange rw'ibiryo bihendutse ku matungo y'inshyushyu. Hashingiwe ku musaruro w'amata wifuza, ibiro by'itungo n'ibiryo biboneka mu karere.

nextgen.name: Ifumbire ya NextGen
nextgen.tagline: Inama z'ifumbire zihariye ku butaka runaka muri Etiyopiya
nextgen.description: Bona inama z'ifumbire zihariye hashingiwe ku hantu uherereye. Harimo inama z'ifumbire y'imborera (compost, vermicompost) n'imvaruganda (Urea, NPS).

decisionTree.name: Igiti cy'Ibyemezo by'Ibihingwa
decisionTree.tagline: Inama ku byiciro by'ikura ry'ibihingwa muri Kenya
decisionTree.description: Bona inama zo kwita ku bihingwa hashingiwe ku cyiciro cyo gukura n'iteganyagihe ririho. Bigufasha gufata ibyemezo ku gihe ku bijyanye no kurwanya udukoko, kuhira no gusarura.

gapAgriculture.name: GAP Ubuhinzi
gapAgriculture.description: Serivisi rusange z'ubujyanama mu buhinzi no kwita ku matungo.

errors.syncFailed: Kuhuza seriveri byanze. Ibikorwa bimwe biragarukira.
errors.uploadFailed: Ifoto yanze kujyaho. Reba internet wongere ugerageze.
errors.serverError: Seriveri yagize ikibazo. Ongera ugerageze nyuma.
